title: Hold for me in Canada
content:
Just bought Pixel 4a 5G to use "Hold For Me" and see in 2020 it's "Only available in the US". 

Is there any update for Canada now that is is nearly May 2021? Will this feature ever become available in Canada?

I've been on hold for 15 minutes now and am kicking myself for upgrading to this device for apparently no good reason.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
